Jim Ferlo won't seek re-election He was a member of the Pittsburgh City Council from 1988 until 2003. Ferlo came out as gay in 2014 and the Pennsylvania Senate's first openly gay legislator."Pennsylvania lawmakers push to change hate crime law". WPVI-DT, September 23, 2014. He was born in Rome, New York.
